page.title: 19Unemployment in Hartlepool
page.content: Because of the high numbers of unemployed in the town, various social and educational activities are springing up to cater for the needs of these people. The largest of these endeavours is the newly developed 'Peoples Centre' which has been created by converting the old police station. This is now the main focal point for all the towns activities for the unemployed. The centre, apart from acting in a supportive role, also provides information, recreational and educational courses and guidance. It is completely run by the unemployed people of the town. Apart from free admission to the local authority run courses in their colleges etc., the unemployed can gain free, more and more of the towns facilities.
